Reviews.Title: Just like the real deal
Reviews.Author: dhawk112
Reviews.Content: This phone came in as it said it would I was a little worried when i bought it cause of how cheap it was. When I got it, it was like having an Iphone 4S its really cool and easy to find a case that fits it. It uses any iphone 4s case. :) Very pleased.

Reviews.Title: great buy
Reviews.Author: D.Leith
Reviews.Content: brought it for my sis but my mom fall in love with it hope I cud reorder one soon, cam takes great pics

Reviews.Title: AWFUL PHONE
Reviews.Author: shareka
Reviews.Content: Awful phone! *DO NOT* buy this phone. I purchased 2 and was disappointed in them. If it has no service you won't get text or calls. It's hard too unlock, NO INTERNET, no apps. This phone is just useless. I recommend everyone too SAVE your money because you will be disappointed. This what i get for being cheap. I just wanted a iPhone...

Reviews.Title: Don't Buy, Not Worth the Money
Reviews.Author: Amanda
Reviews.Content: The phone looks like an Iphone, but it does not look like the picture. The actual screen is small. The graphics on the phone are horrible, the phone barely works using just your fingers, you have to use the stylus pen if you want to take advantage of the touch screen. The phone constantly freezes. The camera quality is abysmal, you can barely see anything! The phone is not durable at all. The plastic on the back of the phone scratches very easily, so if you are clumsy, I don't recommend this phone. You can't connect to WIFI. The phone has TERRIBLE battery life and the call quality is horrible. YES, The phone is cheap, but it's not worth the money.In all, I only gave it 1 star because that's the minimum rating you can give the product. It may be cheap, but ultimately, it will be a waste of your money. Take my advice and keep scrolling!

Reviews.Title: Bad Phone !!
Reviews.Author: Jesnique johnson
Reviews.Content: HORRIBLE!  NOOOOOOO .DONT DO IT , SAVE YOUR MONEY. I DO NOT  LIKE THIS AND WILL LIKE MY MONEY BACK

Reviews.Title: it's not what I expected!!!!!!!!!
Reviews.Author: Ben Ali Mahfoudh
Reviews.Content: I try to open the back to put the batery,the back cover crake,and the cover dont close any more.I don't like it

Reviews.Title: Worst Phone
Reviews.Author: Herve Tchumkam "Heranderson"
Reviews.Content: The charger keeps signaling bad contact. And even when it charges, you dial one time and the battery is gone. Huge waste of time and money. Simply depressing.

Reviews.Title: I hate this phone
Reviews.Author: peter osas obazee
Reviews.Content: The phone insensitive you have to press and press and press before it can respond if at all.so I hate it.

Reviews.Title: Total disappointment
Reviews.Author: Unsatified
Reviews.Content: This phone was nothing like I expected I couldnt access the internet or the playstore. The phone was very plastic looking and it kept dropping calls

Reviews.Title: how good it is
Reviews.Author: dreak
Reviews.Content: It is the best cuz u can get it for cheap but I was a lil worried when I dout it wasn't goin 2 come n but it came like it said

Reviews.Title: junk
Reviews.Author: ang
Reviews.Content: i do not recommend this phone to anyone.can not connect to wifi, this phone is useless,if you want to buy from life deals, don't save your money and buy from other companies.

Reviews.Title: terrible
Reviews.Author: D'Ebony Brooks
Reviews.Content: I wouldn't even get this phone for a 5 year old.. terrible screen quality! absolutely terrible. its almost imposible to use the touchscreen.

Reviews.Title: This phone is stupid can't dwnload is slow
Reviews.Author: Princess
Reviews.Content: U can't dial out waste my time and money Might as well just stick to my iPhone smh smh smh

Reviews.Title: worst phone ever
Reviews.Author: Barb H.
Reviews.Content: I bought two of these, both garbage. One broke the very first time my bf dropped it and the screen was scratched when it came out of the box. The technology on the phone is worse than a $10 prepaid phone. Not even close to joking. Dont waste your money on this phone, you WILL be disappointed.

Reviews.Title: waste of time and money
Reviews.Author: kevin barnes
Reviews.Content: Seriously? I can’t believe it.  I bought two of these phones and one of them the touch screen not working and the other is just a waste of time and money. I can’t believe there selling these phones. These should go in the trash. The battery can’t even last one hour, No wifi, Bluetooth can’t connect. etc.

Reviews.Title: don't buy this it sucks
Reviews.Author: justina
Reviews.Content: I hate this phone it won't let me do anything with this phone the screen freezes it won't let me unlock it most of yhe time. It won't let me download any apps not even send a text message. I activated it and everything like I was supposed to but iy wony let me do anything

Reviews.Title: Never Again
Reviews.Author: Marie Hemmingway
Reviews.Content: This phone is terrible! It works at the speed of a snail and is of a very poor quality. It does not keep a charge, turns completely off without having to be turned off, and the pictures are blurry.

Reviews.Title: Worst purchase I every made!!!
Reviews.Author: Ree
Reviews.Content: A big 0. It was the worst product I have every bought. You cant push the icons on the screen. The back is plastic and almost broke when I tried to pull it off. Most of the other things dont work. I would never recommend noone I know to buy anything from here. I was shock because I heard some good and bad things about this company. But I guess the bad truly out do the good. I hate the phone and its not even worth sending it bad.

Reviews.Title: don't buy this phone.
Reviews.Author: Mary Stevens
Reviews.Content: This is the worst phone i have ever seen,got this for my daughter for her birthday gift she and i are very disappointed,not what i payed for.

Reviews.Title: Bought for overseas travel
Reviews.Author: Vernadette
Reviews.Content: I purchased two of these phones for our 2 week vacation in Thailand & Japan. My sole purpose in the purchase was to ensure my son and I could contact one another if we were separated. I will cross my fingers and let you know. In our everyday life, we have an IPhone 4 and Galaxy S4- I don't think I would buy these for everyday use

Reviews.Title: I wasn't pleased.
Reviews.Author: Gillian
Reviews.Content: This phone is not at all what I expected.. I'm very Disappointed.. I'm nott going to tell you not to buy it because you may like it but in my opinion. its a terrible phone. front cam has terrible quality and the touch is bad. dosnt have half the qualities it says it has im just overall disappointed .

Reviews.Title: Debbie WInkler
Reviews.Author: Debbie E. Winkler
Reviews.Content: This was not an I phone as we thought it has a pull out antenna.  We threw it in the trash.

Reviews.Title: knock-off
Reviews.Author: vanessa
Reviews.Content: looks nothing like the phone a waist of money and time.The phone dint have the apple sign on it.When you turn it on it looked like a computer game. The charger was very hard to put into the phone.It took a while to get delivered.Horrible buy and a waist of my time and money.Currently having trouble with a refund its been a week and haven't had no contact with seller very frustrating. But hey what can you expect the deal was to good to be true this is what i get for trying to be cheap

Reviews.Title: sucked
Reviews.Author: jermaine
Reviews.Content: it had many missing pieces, and a rip off, and i want my money back for this worthless smart phone.
